pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#语法结构","depth":2,"text":"语法结构 "},{"url":"#语法规范","depth":2,"text":"语法规范 "},{"url":"#template","depth":3,"text":"template "},{"url":"#design","depth":3,"text":"design "},{"url":"#data","depth":3,"text":"data "},{"url":"#theme","depth":3,"text":"theme "},{"url":"#使用案例","depth":2,"text":"使用案例 "},{"url":"#常规渲染","depth":3,"text":"常规渲染 "},{"url":"#流式渲染","depth":3,"text":"流式渲染 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["信息图语法是一套类 Mermaid 的语法，用于描述模板、设计、数据与主题。它适合 AI 流式输出，也适合人工编写，并通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Infographic"}]," 的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"render(syntax)"}]," 直接渲染。"]}],"
",["$r","InfographicStreamRunner",null,{"children":["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title 客户增长引擎
  desc 多渠道触达与复购提升
  items
    - label 线索获取
      value 18.6
      desc 渠道投放与内容获客
      icon mdi/rocket-launch
    - label 转化提效
      value 12.4
      desc 线索评分与自动跟进
      icon mdi/progress-check
    - label 复购提升
      value 9.8
      desc 会员体系与权益运营
      icon mdi/account-sync
    - label 口碑传播
      value 6.2
      desc 社群激励与推荐裂变
      icon mdi/account-group
    - label 客户成功
      value 7.1
      desc 培训支持与使用激活
      icon mdi/book-open-page-variant
    - label 产品增长
      value 10.2
      desc 试用转化与功能引导
      icon mdi/chart-line
    - label 数据洞察
      value 8.5
      desc 关键指标与归因分析
      icon mdi/chart-areaspline
    - label 生态合作
      value 5.4
      desc 联合营销与资源互换
      icon mdi/handshake
"}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["信息图语法受到 AntV G2、G6 的图形语法启发，并结合",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-theory","children":"信息图理论"}],"和",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-design","children":"设计原则"}],"。它的目标是让你专注于内容和视觉，不必陷入底层细节。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["我们将信息图表示为：",["$r","Math",null,{"children":"信息图 = 信息结构 + 图形表意"}]]}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*Ir9aTL5mKQYAAAAARVAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","width":"50%"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"信息结构对应数据的抽象，决定内容与层级；图形表意对应设计的抽象，决定视觉呈现与风格。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"语法结构","children":"语法结构 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["入口使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"infographic [template-name]"}],"，之后通过块（block）描述 template、design、data、theme。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title 客户增长引擎
  desc 多渠道触达与复购提升
  items
    - label 线索获取
      value 18.6
      desc 渠道投放与内容获客
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
    - label 转化提效
      value 12.4
      desc 线索评分与自动跟进
      icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"语法规范","children":"语法规范 "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["入口使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"infographic [template-name]"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"键值对使用空格分隔，缩进使用两个空格"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"structure [name]"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"item [name]"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"title [name]"}]," 省略 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"type"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["对象数组使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"-"}]," 换行（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data.items"}],"），简单数组使用行内写法（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"palette"}],"）"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["容器相关配置写在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"new Infographic({ ... })"}],"（如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"padding"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"editable"}],"），语法中只写 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"template"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"design"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"theme"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"template","children":"template "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"模板在入口处直接指定。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic <template-name>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"design","children":"design "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"设计块用于选择结构、卡片与标题等模块。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"design
  structure <structure-name>
    gap 12
  item <item-name>
    showIcon true
  title default
    align center
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"data","children":"data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"数据块是信息结构的核心，通常包含标题、描述与列表项，支持嵌套层级。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"data
  title 组织结构
  desc 产品增长团队
  items
    - label 产品增长
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
      children
        - label 增长策略
          desc 指标与实验设计
          icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
        - label 用户运营
          desc 生命周期运营
          icon activities-037_v1_lineal
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"theme","children":"theme "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"主题块用于切换主题与调整色板、字体与风格化能力。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用预设主题："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"theme <theme-name>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"搭配自定义主题："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"theme
  colorBg #0b1220
  colorPrimary #ff5a5f
  palette #ff5a5f #1fb6ff #13ce66
  stylize rough
    roughness 0.3
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用案例","children":"使用案例 "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"常规渲染","children":"常规渲染 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"直接一次性渲染完整语法。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"import {Infographic} from '@antv/infographic';

const instance = new Infographic({
  container: '#container',
  width: 900,
  height: 540,
  padding: 24,
});

const syntaxText = `
infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title 客户增长引擎
  desc 多渠道触达与复购提升
  items
    - label 线索获取
      value 18.6
      desc 渠道投放与内容获客
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
    - label 转化提效
      value 12.4
      desc 线索评分与自动跟进
      icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
`;

instance.render(syntaxText);
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"流式渲染","children":"流式渲染 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["模型输出片段后持续调用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"render"}]," 更新（伪代码）。每次收到新的语法片段，就追加到缓冲区并重新渲染，让画面与输出同步更新。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"import {Infographic} from '@antv/infographic';

const instance = new Infographic({
  container: '#container',
  width: 900,
  height: 540,
  padding: 24,
});

const chunks = [
  'infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow\n',
  'data\n  title 客户增长引擎\n  desc 多渠道触达与复购提升\n',
  '  items\n    - label 线索获取\n      value 18.6\n',
  '      desc 渠道投放与内容获客\n      icon company-021_v1_lineal\n',
];

let buffer = '';
for (const chunk of chunks) {
  buffer += chunk;
  instance.render(buffer);
}
"}]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Infographic syntax is a Mermaid-like grammar for describing templates, designs, data, and themes. It works well with AI streaming output and manual editing alike, and you can render it directly via ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Infographic.render(syntax)"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","InfographicStreamRunner",null,{"children":["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title Customer Growth Engine
  desc Multi-channel reach and repeat purchases
  items
    - label Lead Acquisition
      value 18.6
      desc Channel investment and content marketing
      icon mdi/rocket-launch
    - label Conversion Optimization
      value 12.4
      desc Lead scoring and automated follow-ups
      icon mdi/progress-check
    - label Loyalty Boost
      value 9.8
      desc Membership programs and benefits
      icon mdi/account-sync
    - label Brand Advocacy
      value 6.2
      desc Community rewards and referral loops
      icon mdi/account-group
    - label Customer Success
      value 7.1
      desc Training support and activation
      icon mdi/book-open-page-variant
    - label Product Growth
      value 10.2
      desc Trial conversion and feature nudges
      icon mdi/chart-line
    - label Data Insight
      value 8.5
      desc Key metrics and attribution analysis
      icon mdi/chart-areaspline
    - label Ecosystem
      value 5.4
      desc Co-marketing and resource swaps
      icon mdi/handshake
"}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Infographic syntax is inspired by AntV G2 and G6 graphical grammars, and it blends in insights from ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-theory","children":"Infographic Theory"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/infographic-design","children":"Design Principles"}],". Its goal is to keep your focus on storytelling and visuals instead of low-level plumbing."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["We express an infographic as: ",["$r","Math",null,{"children":"Infographic = Information Structure + Graphic Semantics"}]]}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*Ir9aTL5mKQYAAAAARVAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","width":"50%"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Information structure captures the data abstraction that determines content and hierarchy, while graphic semantics captures the design abstraction that defines the visual appearance and style."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"syntax-structure","children":"Syntax Structure "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The entry point starts with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"infographic [template-name]"}],", followed by blocks that describe the template, design, data, and theme."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title Customer Growth Engine
  desc Multi-channel reach and repeat purchases
  items
    - label Lead Acquisition
      value 18.6
      desc Channel investment and content marketing
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
    - label Conversion Optimization
      value 12.4
      desc Lead scoring and automated follow-ups
      icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"syntax-rules","children":"Syntax Rules "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["The entry starts with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"infographic [template-name]"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Key-value pairs use spaces for separation, and indentation is done with two spaces."}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["blocks like ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"structure [name]"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"item [name]"}],", or ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"title [name]"}]," omit the ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"type"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Object arrays use ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"-"}]," on new lines (e.g., ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data.items"}],"), while simple arrays stay inline (e.g., ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"palette"}],")."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Container-specific configurations belong in ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"new Infographic({ ... })"}]," (such as ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"padding"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"editable"}],"); inside the syntax you only define ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"template"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"design"}],", or ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"theme"}],"."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"template","children":"template "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The template is declared directly in the entry point."}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"infographic <template-name>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"design","children":"design "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"design"}]," block selects structures, cards, titles, and other modules."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"design
  structure <structure-name>
    gap 12
  item <item-name>
    showIcon true
  title default
    align center
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"data","children":"data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data"}]," block is the core of the information structure. It typically contains titles, descriptions, and item lists, and it supports nested hierarchies."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"data
  title Organizational Structure
  desc Product growth org
  items
    - label Product Growth
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
      children
        - label Growth Strategy
          desc Metrics and experiment design
          icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
        - label User Lifecycle
          desc Lifecycle operations
          icon activities-037_v1_lineal
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"theme","children":"theme "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"theme"}]," block switches themes and tweaks palettes, fonts, and stylization."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Use a preset theme:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"theme <theme-name>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Use a custom theme:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-plain","children":"theme
  colorBg #0b1220
  colorPrimary #ff5a5f
  palette #ff5a5f #1fb6ff #13ce66
  stylize rough
    roughness 0.3
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage-cases","children":"Usage Cases "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"regular-rendering","children":"Regular Rendering "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Render the entire syntax in one go."}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"import {Infographic} from '@antv/infographic';

const instance = new Infographic({
  container: '#container',
  width: 900,
  height: 540,
  padding: 24,
});

const syntaxText = `
infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title Customer Growth Engine
  desc Multi-channel reach and repeat purchases
  items
    - label Lead Acquisition
      value 18.6
      desc Channel investment and content marketing
      icon company-021_v1_lineal
    - label Conversion Optimization
      value 12.4
      desc Lead scoring and automated follow-ups
      icon antenna-bars-5_v1_lineal
`;

instance.render(syntaxText);
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"streaming-rendering","children":"Streaming Rendering "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Call ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"render"}]," repeatedly as the model outputs fragments (pseudo code). Append every new syntax chunk to a buffer and re-render so the canvas stays in sync."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"import {Infographic} from '@antv/infographic';

const instance = new Infographic({
  container: '#container',
  width: 900,
  height: 540,
  padding: 24,
});

const chunks = [
  'infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow\n',
  'data\n  title Customer Growth Engine\n  desc Multi-channel reach and repeat purchases\n',
  '  items\n    - label Lead Acquisition\n      value 18.6\n',
  '      desc Channel investment and content marketing\n      icon company-021_v1_lineal\n',
];

let buffer = '';
for (const chunk of chunks) {
  buffer += chunk;
  instance.render(buffer);
}
"}]}]]}]]
